i.name: Cursed Touch
i.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

q.name: Bandage Toss
q.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

w.name: Despair
w.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.

e.name: Tantrum
e.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

r.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
r.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.

riot.name: Cursed Touch
riot.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

i1.name: Cursed Touch
i1.blurb: Amumu's basic attacks Curse enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Amumu's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Curse of the Sad Mummy|Amumu}} apply a {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds, refreshing with each subsequent basic attack.
i1.description2: {{as|Cursed|buzzword}} targets receive {{tip|true damage|{{as|10% '''bonus''' true damage}}}} from all incoming {{as|magic damage}}, calculated before {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} reduction.
notes: * ''Cursed Touch'' will not apply if the basic attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if the attack {{tip|blind|misses}}.

riot.name: Bandage Toss
riot.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
riot.tooltip: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} second.

q1.name: Bandage Toss
q1.blurb: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' tosses a bandage in the target direction that {{tip|stun|stuns}} the first enemy it hits for 1 second, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|dash|pulling}} him to their location.
notes: * ''Bandage Toss'' cannot be cast while Amumu is {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* Crowd control effects will not prevent Amumu from dashing if they hit him before the skill shot hits. However, the duration of the crowd control can persist the duration of the dash.

* While Amumu is mid-dash, only knock-abouts crowd control effects will prevent him from reaching his target. Other forms of crowd control will still be applied, but they will not hinder his movement.
* ''Bandage Toss'' does not fizzle on Amumu's death, and it can still stun and damage enemies.
* Amumu is still able to dash even if ''Bandage Toss'' is blocked by [[spell shield]]s.
* The projectile does not interrupt '''Amumu's''' orders and will adjust its direction based on '''Amumu's''' position.

riot.name: Despair
riot.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
riot.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

w1.name: Despair
w1.blurb: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.
w1.description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Amumu''' cries a continuous pool of tears, refreshing {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds and dealing {{as|magic damage}} every half second to nearby enemies.
w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half Second|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0.5 to 1|round=3}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
notes: * ''Despair'' has a minimum duration of 1 second.
* Despite the rounding in ''Despair's'' tooltip, it will do increased damage for every point of {{tt|ability power|+0.005% per 1 AP}}.
* ''Despair'' cannot be toggled-off while [[crowd control|unable to activate abilities]].
* Toggled abilities do not count as ability activation for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} or {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

riot.name: Tantrum
riot.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})(+{{ f2 }}) reduced physical damage.

Active: Amumu tantrums, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce Tantrum's cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Tantrum's passive effect increases in potency with bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

e1.name: Tantrum
e1.blurb: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Amumu''' takes reduced damage from each tick of {{as|physical damage}}, applied after other modifiers.
e1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|2 to 10}} {{as|(+ 3% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|(+ 3% magic resistance)}}}}
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' releases his anger, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
e1.description3: ''Tantrum's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{fd|0.5}} seconds every time '''Amumu''' is hit by a basic attack.
notes: * ''Tantrum's'' cooldown reduction will trigger multiple times for effects such as {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}}.

riot.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
riot.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
riot.tooltip: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for {{ rduration }} seconds.

r1.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
r1.blurb: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' {{tip|entangle|entangles}} surrounding enemies for 2 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and applying {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds.
